power.title: Earth Roots
power.fluff: Roots erupt at your command, lashing and grasping at your enemies

section.name: Attack:
section.text: Wisdom vs. Fortitude

section.name: Hit:
section.text: 3d6 + Wisdom modifier damage.

section.name: Miss:
section.text: Half damage.

section.name: Effect:
section.text: The area creates a zone of writhing roots until the end of your next turn.
Any enemy that starts its turn within the zone is slowed until the start of its next turn. Also, you can take the following action once per turn:

section.name: Move Action:
section.text: You move the zone up to 5 squares.

section.name: Sustain Minor:
section.text: The zone persists until the end of your next turn.
Also, you can choose one enemy within 2 squares of the zone. You slide the chosen enemy 2 squares into a space affected by the zone.

power.title: Faerie Fire
power.fluff: A burst of colorful light envelops your foes, distracting and slowing them until one final flare that sears the flesh and dazzles eyes

section.name: Attack:
section.text: Wisdom vs. Will

section.name: Hit:
section.text: The target is distracted by the lights (save ends).
While distracted, the target is slowed and grants combat advantage.

section.name: Aftereffect:
section.text: 3d6 + Wisdom modifier radiant damage, and the target grants combat advantage until the end of its next turn.

section.name: Miss:
section.text: 1d6 + Wisdom modifier radiant damage, and the target grants combat advantage until the end of its next turn.

power.title: Fire of Life
power.fluff: Searing flames engulf your foes and burns them for a time until the fire leaps off, bringing healing warmth to one of your allies

section.name: Attack:
section.text: Wisdom vs. Reflex

section.name: Hit:
section.text: 2d6 + Wisdom modifier fire damage, and ongoing 5 fire damage (save ends).

If the target drops to 0 hit points or fewer before it saves against the ongoing damage, choose one creature within 5 squares of that target. The chosen creature regains a number of hit points equal to 5 + your Constitution modifier.

section.name: Aftereffect:
section.text: Choose one creature within 5 squares of the target that saved. The chosen creature regains a number of hit points equal to 5 + your Constitution modifier.

section.name: Miss:
section.text: Half damage.

power.title: Fog of Insects
power.fluff: A swarm of insects surges from you, stinging foes all around you before swirling about you to harass your enemies

section.name: Attack:
section.text: Wisdom vs. Fortitude

section.name: Hit:
section.text: 2d10 + Wisdom modifier damage.

section.name: Miss:
section.text: Half damage.

section.name: Effect:
section.text: You activate an Aura 3 (Primal) until the end of the encounter.
Enemies in the aura take a -2 penalty to attack rolls.

section.name: Primal Swarm:
section.text: You can choose one ally in the burst. The ally activates the aura instead of you.

power.title: Form of the Primeval Ape
power.fluff: You assume the form of a primeval ape, a more powerful and ancient version of the modern ape

section.name: Effect:
section.text: You assume the form of the primeval ape until the end of the encounter, or until you use the wild shape class power again.

While you are in this form, you gain a +5 power bonus to Athletics checks and you count as having a running start whenever you jump. Also, if the only movement you do as part of a move action is jumping, the distance you jump is not limited by your speed.
Also while you are in this form, you can use the Primeval Smash attack once.

section.name: Special:
section.text: You can use this power even if you are in your humanoid form, in which case using it counts as using your wild shape class power to assume beast form.

section.name: Attack:
section.text: Wisdom vs. Fortitude

section.name: Hit:
section.text: 2d10 + Wisdom modifier damage, and you knock the target prone.
If the target is Large or smaller, you also push it up to 3 squares.

section.name: Miss:
section.text: Half damage.
If the target is Large or smaller, you push it half the distance.

power.title: Form of the Primeval Bear
power.fluff: You assume the form of the primeval bear, a monstrous creature of great strength and savagery

section.name: Effect:
section.text: You assume the form of the primeval bear until the end of the encounter, or until you use the wild shape class power again.

While you are in this form, you gain a +2 power bonus to Strength checks and Athletics check, and a +2 bonus to Beast Form damage rolls and to grab attack rolls, as well as your defenses against escape attempts.
Also while you are in this form, you can use the Primeval Grab attack once.

section.name: Special:
section.text: You can use this power even if you are in your humanoid form, in which case using it counts as using your wild shape class power to assume beast form.

section.name: Target:
section.text: Wisdom vs. Fortitude

section.name: Hit:
section.text: 2d10 + Wisdom modifier damage.
If the target is Large or smaller, you grab it (until escape).

section.name: Miss:
section.text: Half damage.

power.title: Form of the Primeval Boar
power.fluff: You assume the form of the primeval boar, a tusked creature who hunts in the primeval forests

section.name: Effect:
section.text: You assume the form of the primeval boar until the end of the encounter, or until you use the wild shape class power again.
While you are in this form, you gain a +2 bonus to all defenses against attacks triggered by your movement. You also gain a +4 bonus to damage rolls with charge attacks.
Also while you are in this form, you can use the Primeval Gore attack once.

section.name: Special:
section.text: You can use this power even if you are in your humanoid form, in which case using it counts as using your wild shape class power to assume beast form.

section.name: Target:
section.text: One creature

section.name: Attack:
section.text: Wisdom vs. Fortitude

section.name: Hit:
section.text: 2d10 + Wisdom modifier damage, and you mark the target until the end of your next turn.
If the target is Large or smaller, you slide it 1 square.

section.name: Miss:
section.text: Half damage.
If you charged, you mark the target until the end of your next turn.

section.name: Special:
section.text: When charging, you can use this attack in place of a melee basic attack.

power.title: Heat Metal
power.fluff: Fire erupts from a weapon you touch, creating a brand of fire to scorch your enemies

section.name: Target:
section.target: one Axe, Flail, Heavy blade, Light blade, Pick, or Spear

section.name: Effect:
section.text: Once per round when a Weapon attack using the target hits, the target hit with the attack also takes fire damage equal to your Wisdom modifier. This effect lasts until the end of the encounter.

power.title: Lightning Arc
power.fluff: Twin bolts of lightning strike your foes and knock over creatures near them

section.name: Primary Attack:
section.target: one or two creatures within short range, or one creature
section.text: Wisdom vs. Reflex

section.name: Hit:
section.text: 1d8 + Wisdom modifier lightning damage, and the primary target is dazed until the end of your next turn.

section.name: Miss:
section.text: Half damage.

section.name: Effect:
section.text: You make the secondary attack, centered on the space (or spaces, if you targeted two creatures) of the primary target. This attack is an Area burst 1, but you determine its area as if it was a Close burst 1 used by the primary target.

section.name: Secondary Attack:
section.range: burst 1 centered on the primary target's space
section.text: Wisdom vs. Fortitude
You can apply any bonuses to attack rolls you gain with Thunder powers to this attack roll

section.name: Hit:
section.text: You knock the secondary target prone.

power.title: Savage Frenzy
power.fluff: In a blur of claw and fang, you strike out at nearby enemies

section.name: Attack:
section.text: Wisdom vs. Reflex

section.name: Hit:
section.text: 2d6 + Wisdom modifier damage, and the target is rended (save ends).
While rended, the target is dazed and slowed.

section.name: Aftereffect:
section.text: The target is slowed until the end of its next turn.

section.name: Miss:
section.text: Half damage, and the target cannot take triggered actions until the end of its next turn, and is slowed until the end of your next turn.

power.title: Shillelagh
power.fluff: You imbue a weapon you touch with primal strength, causing the weapon to drive those it strikes to their knees

section.name: Effect:
section.text: Once per round when a Weapon attack using the target hits, the target hit with the attack also takes force damage equal to one-half your Wisdom modifier and is knocked prone.

power.title: Summon Fierce Boar
power.fluff: With a piercing squel, a spirit takes form as a ferocious boar and slams its tusks into your enemies

section.name: Effect:
section.text: You summon a medium Fierce Boar in an unoccupied space within range.
The boar remains until the end of the encounter, or until you take a minor action to dismiss it.
If the boar is reduced to 0 hit points or less, it disappears and you lose a healing surge.

power.title: Summon Giant Toad
power.fluff: You summon a spirit ally, a great toad that flicks its tongue to pluck a meal from among your enemies

section.name: Effect:
section.text: You summon a medium Giant Toad in an unoccupied space within range.
The toad remains until the end of the encounter, or until you take a minor action to dismiss it.
If the toad is reduced to 0 hit points or less, it disappears and you lose a healing surge.

power.title: Summon Natural Ally
power.fluff: You call out to the spirits of the natural world, which send a faithful creature to do your bidding

section.name: Prerequisite:
section.text: A Primal Aspect class feature.

section.name: Effect:
section.text: You summon a creature in an unoccupied space within range. Your choice of creatures depends on your Primal Aspect:

section.name: Primal Guardian:
section.text: A medium Grizzly Bear or a medium Pack Wolf.

section.name: Primal Predator:
section.text: A medium Giant Cobra or a medium Desert Hawk.

section.name: Primal Swarm:
section.text: To be designed.

section.name: Primal Wrath:
section.text: To be decided if kept.
The creature remains until the end of the encounter, or until you take a minor action to dismiss it.
If the creature is reduced to 0 hit points or less, it disappears and you lose a healing surge.

power.title: Vexing Overgrowth
power.fluff: Primal power burst outwards from you, leaving behind a halo of natural phenomena that surround you and hinders enemies in it

section.name: Attack:
section.text: Wisdom vs. Reflex

section.name: Hit:
section.text: 3d6 + Wisdom modifier damage.

section.name: Miss:
section.text: Half damage.

section.name: Effect:
section.text: You activate an Aura 1 (Primal) until the end of the encounter.
Enemies in the aura grant combat advantage.

power.title: Whirlwind of Sand
power.fluff: Scourging sand rakes the air around you, and the fierce wind and drifting dust hinder your enemies' movement

section.name: Attack:
section.text: Wisdom vs. Foritude

section.name: Hit:
section.text: 2d6 + Wisdom modifier damage, and the target is slowed (save ends).

section.name: Miss:
section.text: Half damage.

section.name: Effect:
section.text: If you used this power as a close burst, you activate an Aura 1 (Primal). If you used this power as an area burst and an ally was in the origin square, that ally activates an Aura 1 (Primal).
Squares in the aura are difficult terrain for enemies.

power.title: Wind Prison
power.fluff: Gusting winds batter your foe, and if the enemy escapes the winds, they blast outward and knock your enemies to the ground

section.name: Attack:
section.text: Wisdom vs. Fortitude

section.name: Hit:
section.text: 2d10 + Wisdom modifier damage.

section.name: Miss:
section.text: Half damage.

section.name: Effect:
section.text: The target is bound by winds until the end of the encounter.
While bound, the target grants combat advantage.
If the target willingly moves, this effect immediately ends and each enemy within 5 squares of the target is knocked prone.
